MARK 8.12 jah ufswogjands ahmin seinamma qaþ:
ƕa þata kuni taikn sokeiþ?
amen, qiþa izwis:
jabai gibaidau kunja þamma taikne.
MARK 8.13 jah afletands ins, galeiþands aftra in skip uslaiþ hindar marein.
MARK 8.14 jah ufarmunnodedun niman hlaibans jah niba ainana hlaif ni habaidedun miþ sis in skipa.
MARK 8.15 jah anabauþ im qiþands:
saiƕiþ ei atsaiƕiþ izwis þis beistis Fareisaie jah beistis Herodis.
MARK 8.16 jah þahtedun miþ sis misso qiþandans: unte
hlaibans ni habam.
MARK 8.17 jah fraþjands Iesus qaþ du im:
ƕa þaggkeiþ unte hlaibans ni habaiþ?
ni nauh fraþjiþ nih wituþ, unte daubata habaiþ hairto izwar.
MARK 8.18 augona habandans ni gasaiƕiþ, jah ausona habandans ni gahauseiþ jah ni gamunuþ.
MARK 8.19 þan þans fimf hlaibans gabrak fimf þusundjom, ƕan managos tainjons fullos gabruko usnemuþ?
qeþun du imma:
twalif.
MARK 8.20 aþþan þan þans sibun hlaibans fidwor þusundjom, ƕan managans spwreidans fullans gabruko usnemuþ?
iþ eis qeþun:
sibun.
MARK 8.21 jah qaþ du im:
ƕaiwa ni nauh fraþjiþ?
MARK 8.22 jah qemun in Beþaniin jah berun du imma blindan jah bedun ina ei imma attaitoki.
MARK 8.23 jah fairgreipands handu þis blindins ustauh ina utana weihsis jah speiwands in augona is, atlagjands ana handuns seinos frah ina ga-seƕi-u-ƕa?
MARK 8.24 jah ussaiƕands qaþ:
gasaiƕa mans, þatei swe bagmans gasaiƕa gaggandans.
MARK 8.25 þaþroh aftra galagida handuns ana þo augona is jah gatawida ina ussaiƕan;
jah aftra gasatiþs warþ jah gasaƕ bairhtaba allans.
MARK 8.26 jah insandida ina du garda is qiþands:
ni in þata weihs gaggais,
ni mannhun qiþais in þamma wehsa.
MARK 8.27 jah usiddja Iesus jah siponjos is in wehsa Kaisarias þizos Filippaus:
jah ana wiga frah siponjans seinans qiþands du im:
ƕana mik qiþand mans wisan?
MARK 8.28 iþ eis andhofun:
Iohannen þana daupjand, jah anþarai Helian:
sumaih þan ainana praufete.
MARK 8.29 jah is qaþ du im:
aþþan jus, ƕana mik qiþiþ wisan?
andhafjands þan Paitrus qaþ du imma:
þu is Xristus.
MARK 8.30 jah faurbauþ im ei mannhun ni qeþeina bi ina.
MARK 8.31 jah dugann laisjan ins þatei skal sunus mans filu winnan jah uskiusan skulds ist fram þaim sinistam jah þaim auhumistam gudjam jah bokarjam jah usqiman jah afar þrins dagans usstandan.
MARK 8.32 jah swikunþaba þata waurd rodida;
jah aftiuhands ina Paitrus dugann andbeitan ina;
MARK 8.33 iþ is gawandjands sik jah gasaiƕands þans siponjans seinans andbait Paitru qiþands:
gagg hindar mik, Satana, unte ni fraþjis þaim gudis, ak þaim manne.
MARK 8.34 jah athaitands þo managein miþ siponjam seinaim qaþ du im:
saei wili afar mis laistjan, inwidai sik silban jah nimai galgan seinana jah laistjai mik.
MARK 8.35 saei allis wili saiwala seina ganasjan, fraqisteiþ izai:
iþ saei fraqisteiþ saiwalai seinai in meina jah in þizos aiwaggeljons, ganasjiþ þo.
MARK 8.36 ƕa auk boteiþ mannan, jabai gageigaiþ þana fairƕu allana jah gasleiþeiþ sik saiwalai seinai?
MARK 8.37 aiþþau ƕa gibiþ manna inmaidein saiwalos seinaizos?
MARK 8.38 unte saei skamaiþ sik meina jah waurde meinaize in gabaurþai þizai horinondein jah frawaurhton, jah sunus mans skamaiþ sik is, þan qimiþ in wulþau attins seinis miþ aggilum þaim weiham.
MARK 9.1 Jah qaþ du im:
amen, qiþa izwis þatei sind sumai þize her standandane, þai ize ni kausjand dauþaus, unte gasaiƕand þiudinassu gudis qumanana in mahtai.
MARK 9.2 jah afar dagans saihs ganam Iesus Paitru jah Iakobu jah Iohannen jah ustauh ins ana fairguni hauh sundro ainans:
jah inmaidida sik in andwairþja ize.
MARK 9.3 jah wastjos is waurþun glitmunjandeins, ƕeitos swe snaiws, swaleikos swe wullareis ana airþai ni mag gaƕeitjan.
MARK 9.4 jah ataugiþs warþ im Helias miþ Mose;
